duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain records on the destination, weight, and charges on all incoming and outgoing shipments.
Perform data entry, labeling, and filing, generate import files, assist with the tracking and expediting of freight, and freight and broker invoice auditing.
Ensure accuracy of rate charges by verifying classification of materials with rate schedule.
Monitor pending shipments related to the shipping schedules of purchases issued and update the traffic record system.
Confirm information, provide product information, resolve problems, determine method of shipment and ship items, and maintain records.
Scanning or hand entering information into a computer.
Create bills of lading, shipment reports, and process incoming and outgoing shipment records.
Maintain records of overcharges and for damages to goods in transit.
Occasional safe lifting of varying case weight, shape, and height levels.
Participate in paid training, adhere to safety procedures, and follow protocols.
